name: Salamangreat Burning Shell
text: Special Summon 1 "Salamangreat" monster from your hand, but negate its effects (if any), and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster using monsters you control as material, including that monster, but for the rest of this turn, the Link Summoned monster cannot attack, also it cannot activate its effects. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster in your GY; return it to the Extra Deck. You can only activate 1 "Salamangreat Burning Shell" per turn.
